msn.welcome:
Welcome to Tchissola.
 The ultimate quiz game app that leverages the power of artificial intelligence to let you design and play your very own customized quiz challenges.
msn.suggestions: Here are some keywords suggestions to help you get started:

home.subtitle: Wellcome to ultima
home.noAccount: Hey, you don't have an account yet. You can create one right now.
home.author: Author

gameMaker.title: Create a new quiz
gameMaker.subtitle: Tell me what's the quiz game about and I will create it for you.
gameMaker.subtitleError: Sorry, some problem occurred when try create the quiz game. Please try again or change the title below:
gameMaker.name: What is the game about?
gameMaker.nameShort: The game title can't be empty or too short
gameMaker.demoWarning: This is just a demo game if you want to play full game you need to 'SAVE' before
gameMaker.notLoggedMessage: You need to be logged in to save the game, do you want to login now?

gameView.title: Game View
gameView.subtitle: Play the quiz game
gameView.deleteAsk: Do you want to delete this game?

landing.title1: The ultimate quiz game to challenge your brain.
landing.title2: Design and play your very own customized quiz challenges.
landing.title3: You just need the title and Tchissola will do the rest.
landing.title4: Share your quiz with friends and family.
